LongDescription:
nitoTV was not the imposter! 
 NotAnImposterTV is a tweak that overlays the ejected Among Us characters over the homescreen and screen saver! 
 Based on the popular iOS tweak by @pixelomer (follow him on Twitter)! 
 Follow me on Twitter (@iKilledAppl3), 
 Donate via PayPal (https://paypal.me/iKilledAppl3). 
 Support me on Patreon! (https://www.patreon.com/iKilledAppl3) 
 Changelog: 
 Version 1.0 - Release. 
 Version 1.0.1-1 Update for tvOS 14 
 Version 1.0.2-1 Fixes the issue where the crewmates took over your folders and wouldn't allow you to scroll.
